WorkItem.Description:
Hi, using latest version (b15), and getting some strange issues with BoK and JoW.
 
See attached images.
No Bok, No Jow: http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/1217/noboknojowos3.jpg
 
No Bok, Yes Jow: http://img375.imageshack.us/img375/3812/nobokyesjowth1.jpg
 
Ok, so from No Bok and No Jow, I get max dps on my head piece as 178. If I add in Jow, the max DPS reduces to 138.
 
Yes Bok, No JoW: http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/2701/yesboknojowmo2.jpg
 
Back to first example (no Bok and no Jow) and I get max dps of 178. Add in Bok and the max DPS reduces to 141.
 
XML is attached.
